sailpoint.plugin

Interface PluginContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePluginPolicyExecutor, BasePluginResource, BasePluginService, BasePluginTaskExecutor

    public interface PluginContext
    Interface for plugin developers to access a connection to the plugin database and retrieve plugin setting values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets a connection to the plugin database.

      Gets the Setting value on a plugin that are multiple SailPointObjects

      Gets a multi-valued String setting value for the plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getPluginName

        java.lang.String getPluginName()
        Gets the name of the plugin.
        Returns:
        The plugin name.

      • getConnection

        java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                           throws GeneralException
        Gets a connection to the plugin database.

        IMPORTANT: The caller of this method is responsible for closing the connection appropriately.

        Returns:
        The connection.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getSettingString

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSettingMultiString(java.lang.String settingName)
        Gets a multi-valued String setting value for the plugin.
        Parameters:
        settingName - The name of the setting
        Returns:
        A List of String valued setting values for this plugin
